org.keycloak.protocol.oid4vc.issuance.mappers
 

  • Uses of OID4VCMapper in org.keycloak.protocol.oid4vc.issuance.mappers

    Subclasses of OID4VCMapper in org.keycloak.protocol.oid4vc.issuance.mappers
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    OID4VCContextMapper
    Allows to add the context to the credential subject
    class 
    OID4VCGeneratedIdMapper
    Adds a generated ID to the credential (as a configurable property).
    class 
    OID4VCIssuedAtTimeClaimMapper
    Map issuance date to the credential, under the default claim name "iat"
    class 
    OID4VCStaticClaimMapper
    Allows to add statically configured claims to the credential subject
    class 
    OID4VCSubjectIdMapper
    Sets an ID for the credential, either randomly generated or statically configured
    class 
    OID4VCTargetRoleMapper
    Adds the users roles to the credential subject
    class 
    OID4VCTypeMapper
    Allows to add types to the credential subject
    class 
    OID4VCUserAttributeMapper
    Allows to add user attributes to the credential subject
